categories: Category:Jedi Masters of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: Ryen was a Cathar male Jedi Master who was assigned with his Padawan Ashara Zavros to Taris in order to help the reconstruction project during the Cold War. He was defeated by a dark spirit, who was an ancestor of Ashara; the Sith Lord Kallig subjugated the Force ghost, corrupted Ashara, and killed Ryen.
